title: 21-Day Immune Support IV Package - Neighborhood Naturopathic
description: Our 21-Day Immune Support IV protocol will boost your immune system. Perfect if your'e preparing for a big trip, or the cold and flu season.
cleaned_text: IV Package Whether you are sick of being sick, preparing for a big trip or the cold and flu season, this 21-day IV protocol will kick your immune system into high gear! $749 21-Day Immune Support IV Package Benefits - Improve Immune Function: Calcium chloride aids in the absorption of vitamin D, a powerful immune supporting vitamin, while zinc enhances immune system function and response. - Fewer Illnesses: Magnesium chloride aids in restful sleep, while vitamin C provides powerful antioxidant protection, which can produce a more effective and powerful immune system. - Reduce Illness Recovery Time: Glutathione and B vitamins reduce inflammation and aid in detoxification. - Antioxidant Protection: Vitamin C and selenium are antioxidant powerhouses that are vital for immune function. Package Includes - 3 Immune Support IV Infusions - 3 Glutathione "Push" Add-Ons (after each infusion) - Vitamin D Injection - 5 Recipes to Support Immune Function (food as medicine) FDA Disclosure: The services provided have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. These products are not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any disease. The material on this website is provided for informational purposes only and is not medical advice. Always consult your physician before beginning any therapy program. Any designations or references to therapies are for marketing purposes only and do not represent actual products.
